M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Minesweeper
 
mainMenu() - Method in class view.MinesweeperView
Method that handles the initial logic to determine if certain saved game files are present If there is not a saved game file or a saved serialzied High Score board class file, this method will load a new controller which will create new instances of all the classes incorporated with creating a new game in the MVC structure of the game.
message - Variable in exception exceptions.HitMineException
 
message - Variable in exception exceptions.IllegalMoveException
 
MINE - Static variable in class model.MinesweeperBoard
Locations with mines will have a value = -1 in valBoard.
Minesweeper - Class in <Unnamed>
File: Minesweeper.java Assignment: Final Project Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This class is the main driver for the implementation of the Minesweeper game.
Minesweeper() - Constructor for class Minesweeper
 
MinesweeperBoard - Class in model
File: MinesweeperBoard.java Assignment: Minesweeper Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This class holds all the logic about the current state of a playable Minesweeper game board.
MinesweeperBoard(int, int, String, String) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperBoard
Constructs a new instance of MinsweeperBoard.
MinesweeperController - Class in controller
File: MinsweeperController.java Assignment: Minesweeper Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This class encompasses the Controller in the MVC design pattern followed in the creation of Minesweeper.
MinesweeperController(int, int, int, HighScoreBoard, String, String) - Constructor for class controller.MinesweeperController
Constructor used when a saved serialized HighScoreBoard is present in directory but a saved serialized MinesweeperBoard is NOT present 4 argument constructor
MinesweeperController(MinesweeperBoard, HighScoreBoard) - Constructor for class controller.MinesweeperController
Constructor to be used when a saved and serialized MinesweeperBoard and HighScoreBoard can be found; this is used when a saved game is loaded up and continued.
MinesweeperController(MinesweeperBoard) - Constructor for class controller.MinesweeperController
Constructor used in the event that a saved and serialized MinesweeperBoard is present but a saved and serialized HighScoreBoard is NOT present.
MinesweeperModel - Class in model
File: MinesweeperModel.java Assignment: Minesweeper Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This class represents the model in the MVC Design pattern followed in the design of this iteration of Minesweeper.
MinesweeperModel(int, int, int, HighScoreBoard, String, String) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
Constructor for when there is a High Score saved file, but not Save Game file in the present working directory For a NEW board and EXISTING HighScoreBoard
MinesweeperModel(MinesweeperBoard) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
Constructor for when there is a Saved Game file present but NOT a High Score saved serialized file in the directory.
MinesweeperModel(MinesweeperBoard, HighScoreBoard) - Constructor for class model.MinesweeperModel
Constructor for when there is a Saved Game file and a High Score saved file actively in the directory of this program.
MinesweeperTest - Class in testing
File: MinesweeperTest.java Assignment: Minesweeper Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This is a tester class, which acheives near 100% statement and branch coverage of the MinesweeperModel and MinesweeperController classes, excepting some exceptions.
MinesweeperTest() - Constructor for class testing.MinesweeperTest
 
MinesweeperView - Class in view
File: MinesweeperView.java Assignment: Final Project Course: CSC 335; Spring 2021 This class is the view for the Minesweeper game.
MinesweeperView() - Constructor for class view.MinesweeperView
 
model - package model
